##Simple linear model
```{r exploring data}
plot(income.data$income,income.data$happiness,xlab='income',ylab='happiness level',main='happiness given income')
```

```{r}
# Created a parsnip specification for a linear model

lm_spec <- linear_reg() %>%
  set_mode("regression") %>%
  set_engine("lm")

# Fit our specification to our data

slr_mod <- lm_spec %>% 
fit(happiness~ income, data = income.data)

# View our model output
tidy(slr_mod)
```
